title: Jill Zarin’s Ultimate Girl Trip, BravoCon and more
description:
Heather interviews Jill Zarin and her daughter Ally Shapiro in their LA hotel. They record another 'What Would Jill Zarin Do?' episode. Ally discusses her "reality mom" Jill and how being on reality TV so young has affected her. Would Ally be interested in a spin-off with housewife offspring? Jill answers questions about what she would do in various housewife scenarios as well as a few pop culture moments. Her answers to a few questions may surprise you! It’s a juicy episode! Enjoy.

Subscribe on Apple Podcasts to get exclusive Extra Juicy episodes every Friday and get all episodes of Juicy Scoop, ad-free
